name: raft wars (itch)
description: Use: WASD to move, arrow keys to turn, E to fire canons, F to place rocks.  forces are applied at the green dot in the center of you raft so if you are not symmetrical around that point trying to move will cause you to spin. click the button then next to your raft to place a tile there. collect wood to afford more and better tiles. build your boat as big as you can to destroy the enemies. This is the result of a ten week long senior project for more on that go to https://basisseniorprojects.com/prescott/author/ivanm/ and for the arrive of prevues virtuous go to https://doubleigames.itch.io/raftio. I may still be updating this so if you have suggestions or comments please leave them in the comments.
